CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, pg. 21, reads: "'Queen and Her Court' - Mrs. Adelaide Montgomery was crowned 'Queen of the Coronation Ball,' which was sponsored by the Joseph Workman Club of Mellon Institute at the Royal Ballroom. The 'Queen' poses with her 'court,' left to right, the Mesdames Ada Graves, Maude Jones, and Montgomery, and the Misses Barbara Pease and Marlyn White.  Robert Tucker as chairman of the affair, and Paul C. Williams is club president. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Ada Bruce Graves, Maude Jones, "Queen of the Coronation Ball" Adelaide Montgomery wearing tiara and holding bouquet, Barbara Peace, and Marlyn White, posed on stage
